name: mainline
title: Mainline
desc: A minimal and modern landing page template built with shadcn/ui and Tailwind 4. Contains all the core pages and sections for a landing page or marketing website.
article:
Tech Stack

  • Astro 5
  • shadcn/ui
  • Tailwind 4
  • Figma
  • Markdown
  • Typescript

Features

  • 100+ components
  • 10+ pages
  • Figma File included
  • Astro React
  • All pages built using block sections, easily insert new blocks from our library!
  • Astro content collections
  • Markdown & MDX
  • Responsive mobile-first design
  • Astro SEO
  • Astro Sitemap
